Texts.Eng:
The Droden were created by the Avikan as expendable soldiers to use in their war against the Theleans. After their failed uprising during the Droden War, a ban was placed on the creation of new AIs, and nowadays only few true AI remain. Effective, light combat droids. Fragile, but resistant to radiation and poison.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Robotic

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Energy x^green;1.15^reset;, Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;10^reset;% Speed
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;40^reset;% Poison & Radiation
  Max Food x^green;2.5^reset;
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Poison, Oxygen
  ^green;Legion^reset;: x1.075 damage per Droden follower (max 2)

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Broadsword/Shortsword: +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance
  Assault Rifle: +^green;25^reset;% Crit Damage

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;25^reset;% Physical, -^red;40^reset;%Electric
